Osmosis Facials.Name: Osmosis Taster Facial
Osmosis Facials.Add_Text: An introduction to Osmosis! This facial is designed speciﬁcally to your skin needs. Including cleanse, exfoliation, mask, and appropriate moisturizer this facial is perfect for all skin Types but especially for clients looking for a deep cleanse. Enioy a hot oil scalp massage while the mask works it's magic on your skin.

Osmosis Facials.Name: Osmosis Revitapen Facial
Osmosis Facials.Add_Text: Micro needling results without the abrasion of a needle! RevitaPen allows deeper penetration of Vitamin A, resulting in an increase of cellular activity leaving the skin smooth, plump and youthful. This is an amazing facial for any client wanting to achieve anti aging results. While penetrating Vitamin A deeper into the skin it also speeds up healing, prevents breakouts and supports the skin's immune system.

Osmosis Facials.Name: Osmosis Custom Facial with Revitapen
Osmosis Facials.Add_Text: /’Tailor-made’ to fit your individual skin needs! Using a combination of powder blends and serums from Osmosis (depending on your individual skin Type) this facial accomplishes a deep cleanse, exfoliation and hydration of your skin. The Osmosis RevitaPen is also used to ensure deeper product penetration. A skin consultation is also included to ensure accurate results.

Packages.Name: Glow to Go Spa Indulgence Package
Packages.Add_Text: Experience the feeling of being in a Spa with this luxurious package. Includes a Swedish Full Body Massage and 0 Coconut Hot Oil Scalp Massage

Packages.Name: Osmosis Face & Body Sensation
Packages.Add_Text: This instant pick-me-up package includes a 30 min Osmosis introduction facial focusing mainly on a deep cleanse and achieving radiant results for the skin. To experience full relaxation a 30 min Coconut Hot Oil Back Massage is also performed.

Packages.Name: All About You Package
Packages.Add_Text: This package is all about treating you! This treatment consists of a Glow To Go Exclusive Pedicure which includes foot soak, cuticle work, nail shape, exfoliation, dead skin removal, foot massage and choice of colour. Sit back and relax while you are being pampered in our luxurious pedicure chair. From here, you can take a seat at our Manicure station where you will be treated to a Shellac Manicure (colour) and a Glow To Go Cocktail Spray Tan (shade and fragrance of your choice) to finish. Perfect for those big nights out!
